turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Anya Sharma. It's been impossible to get through on the phone.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. Can you please provide your full name and date of birth for verification?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Sarah Miller, and my birthday is 03/15/1988. Why is it so hard to get a human on the phone these days anyway? It's so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Sarah. I understand your frustration. Let me see Dr. Sharma's availability. What is the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's for a follow-up on my bloodwork. I had some slightly elevated cholesterol levels last time, and she wanted to recheck them in three months. Is she available anytime next week? Actually, before I forget... what are Dr. Sharma's qualifications anyway? I never really asked.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I see. Let me check for availability next week. As for Dr. Sharma's qualifications, that information is available on our website at [website address]. Regarding appointments, Dr. Sharma is available on Tuesday at 2 PM or Thursday at 10 AM. Would either of those times work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Thursday at 10 AM works perfectly. Great! Thanks so much for your help! Much easier than waiting on hold.
